actionTemplate.title: Willow-Leaf Brow
steps: Thin front, gently curved body, and a long slender tail
Sketch a thin lower line, then a softer top line
Elongate and taper the tail to a leaf-like point
Keep the front airy; deepen the tail without going too dark
Blend and refine the tail line

rationaleTemplate: A slim curve makes the eyes look longer and more elegant.
Works well for soft, classic styles.
